backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing candidates, enquiries, contact messages, file uploads, and authorization with timestamp sorting helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all major frontend components, pages, and config files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining brand color variables, dark mode tokens, and global background/text defaults.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO tags, social metadata, favicon, and script loader for the React app.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots file allowing all crawlers and linking to the sitemap.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Sitemap listing all major public routes with priorities and update frequencies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for public pages and protected admin dashboard using shared layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button handling auth state, errors, and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/Brand/Logo.tsx: Simple logo component rendering the static agency logo image.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with navigation links, contact info, legal links, and a branded copyright block.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main page layout including top navigation, outlet content, footer, and WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Implements responsive top navigation with links, logo, login button, and a mobile sidebar menu.
frontend/src/components/SectionHeading.t: Reusable heading component providing consistent H1/H2 typography.
frontend/src/components/Seo.tsx: Runtime SEO manager updating page title and meta tags on navigation.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppFloating: Floating WhatsApp action button linking to chat for the agency number.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and identity state.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode colors, and brand color utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays the About page with mission, vision, commitment cards, and agency background content.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard page fetching candidates, enquiries, and messages, with filtering and delete actions via React Query and actor calls.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminGuard.tsx: Auth guard that checks Internet Identity login and admin status before rendering admin content, showing appropriate alerts when blocked.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides contact forms for candidates and clients, submitting messages via the backend actor with success handling.
frontend/src/pages/HandymanRegistrationP: Form page allowing candidates to register and upload documents, using mutations to submit data and track upload progress.
frontend/src/pages/HireHandymanPage.tsx: Client enquiry form that submits hiring requests via a mutation and displays success feedback.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero content, contact info, operating locations, and links to registration and hiring pages.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Static privacy policy page outlining data collection, usage, and security practices.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Describes recruitment services offered to clients and candidates, including sourcing, screening, and placement.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing parameters from hashes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme colors, fonts, animations, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, architecture notes, and current site implementation scope.
